mapper.sql: id, auth_name, auth_desc, perms, icon, link_url, type, status, parent_id, is_del, sort_no, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_auth
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_auth (id, auth_name, auth_desc, perms, icon, link_url, type, status, parent_id, is_del, sort_no, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_auth
id,
auth_name,
auth_desc,
perms,
icon,
link_url,
type,
status,
parent_id,
is_del,
sort_no,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_auth
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
auth_name = #{record.authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_desc = #{record.authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{record.perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{record.linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sort_no = #{record.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update sys_auth set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auth_name = #{record.authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_desc = #{record.authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{record.perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url = #{record.linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sort_no = #{record.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update sys_auth
auth_name = #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_desc = #{authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_auth set auth_name = #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_desc = #{authDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select distinct a.* from sys_auth a left join sys_role_auth ro on ro.auth_id=a.id left join sys_role r on r.id=ro.role_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=r.id left join sys_user u on u.id=ur.user_id where u.id=#{userId} and r.is_del=1 and a.is_del=1 order by a.sort_no
select distinct a.* from sys_auth a left join sys_role_auth ro on ro.auth_id=a.id where ro.role_id=#{roleId} and a.is_del=1 order by a.sort_no

select distinct a.* from sys_auth a left join sys_role_auth ro on ro.auth_id=a.id left join sys_role r on r.id=ro.role_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=r.id left join sys_user u on u.id=ur.user_id where u.id=#{userId} and a.type in (1,2) and r.is_del=1 and a.is_del=1 order by a.sort_no
